item.title: Into to Markdown
item.description: What is Markdown Basic Syntax Headings Italicized Bold Blockquote Code Blocks Links Images What is Markdown Before talking about what Markdown is, we should first introduce Markup. The most popular Markup language is HyperText Markup Language or HTML. Markup allows us to use tags to structure a web document. Despite Markup being widely used, tags that are used to annotate text can be long and take time to write.
